item.title: Backyard Inspiration Board
item.description: I’m planning to share the progress we’ve made so far in our backyard very soon…it’s really starting to come together!

item.title: Hidden Tank Fire Table Roundup
item.description: I’ve been on the hunt for the perfect fire table for our backyard, especially right now when the weather is chilly and we still want to enjoy our back patio.
